channel.title: Runeonymous 317 ||HD-FS||Weekly Big Updates||
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]Website : [u][url=http://www.Runeonymous.com]www.Runeonymous.com[/url][/u][/b] [b]Play now : [u][url=http://www.runeonymous.com/Runeonymous.jar]http://www.runeonymous.com/Runeonymous.jar[/url] [/b][/size] Ballista
Group Slayer
Group Dungeoneering
Drygores
Zulrah
G.e
Hiscores
Custom Home Areas
Every skill works flawlessly, with a competetive hiscores
Custom boss drop log
Custom monsters killed log
Clue scrolls
In chat emojis / emoticons Imbued items
Working dwarf multicannon
No scam dicing system
Forums
Auto vote
Auto donation
Fully working farming
Stable economy
Dedicated hosting
Runeonymous.com
Welcome to Runeonymous. The new, upcoming RSPS. We are currently in BETA however the game is being worked on and updated daily.
This server is the perfect blend between OSRS and Pre-Eoc RS, as it was in 2007, all the way up to just before EOC.
What puts Runeonymous ahead of the competition? Runeonymous has many unique features and content that you'll find nowhere else. Everything is built from the ground up and designed to offer you those memorable moments either alone or with friends.
We currenty have custom minigames, bosses, fully working Nex, mini-quests, zombie hoarde minigame and many many more. Our economy is actually one players can look forward to joining, with your rare drops actually making a difference!
Runeonymous' devlopers are true Runescape veterans and as players we know the best course of action is to listen to the players! Which is why every post on the suggestions thread is read and carefully considered. We are looking to become one of, if not THE best RSPS around, so we have tried our best to make everything as fun and enjoyable as possible. From adding FULL dungeoneering to a fully functional G.E
Runeonymous is in its early days, but don't let that put you off. We have many ideas and cotent is being added to the game regularly.

item.title: Runeonymous 317 ||HD-FS||Weekly Big Updates||
item.dc:creator: @Skillstreak Skillstreak
item.description:
@Skillstreak wrote:

Brilliant server, excellent developers and owners. This is the beginning of greatness and would strongly recommend everyone to join! Would love to have more players join me on this, the community is brilliant as it is and i’m sure all new members will only make it greater!

Server is still going strong, the community is really helpful and friendly, don’t miss out on the opportunity to witness the growth of the soon to be Number 1 RSPS of 2016!

Read full topic
